name: Stanislav

projects.title: Podorozhnyky Travel Platform
projects.description: Full-stack travel platform where users can publish stories, manage profiles with avatars and bios, save favorite posts, browse themed collections, and switch light/dark mode. Includes secure authentication with refresh tokens, SSR-optimized pages, and responsive UI.

projects.title: RentalCar â€” Dark Premium UI
projects.description: Frontend platform for premium car rental services featuring a Dark Premium interface inspired by luxury automotive brands. Includes a dynamic catalog with filters (brand, price, mileage), responsive grid, detailed car pages with full specs, favorites system, custom UI components, and optimized Hero Banner animations. Fully responsive for desktop, tablet, and mobile, with production-ready architecture and API integration layer.

projects.title: Contacts REST API
projects.description: RESTful API for managing a contact list with secure JWT authentication, data validation, Swagger documentation, and full CRUD operations.

projects.title: Movie Search App
projects.description: SPA for movie search using TMDB API with pagination and query caching.

projects.title: ArtistsHub
projects.description: Collaborative platform connecting music fans with artists.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Building complete web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Focused on clean, maintainable code and user-friendly interfaces.

services.title: Front-End Development
services.description: Developing interactive UI components with React. Experience with routing, state management, API integration, and reusable component design.

services.title: Back-End Development
services.description: Creating server-side logic using Node.js and Express.js. Building RESTful APIs, managing data with MongoDB, and ensuring secure and scalable server functionality.

services.title: Deployment & Version Control
services.description: Deploying applications using platforms like Netlify, Vercel, or Render. Version control and collaboration using Git and GitHub.

aboutpara: I am a Fullstack Developer skilled in creating responsive single-page applications (SPAs), REST APIs, and authentication systems utilizing React, Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. My solid analytical and communication abilities were developed through my experience in teaching computer science. I am passionate about writing clean code, fostering teamwork, and building products that make a difference.

resume.description: My solid analytical and communication abilities were developed through my experience in teaching computer science.

education.universityPara: Completed a full-stack development program and earned an official certification. The training provided practical experience in building both client-side and server-side applications using modern technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Node.js. I can confidently develop full-stack solutions, implement clean architecture, work with APIs, and deliver production-ready features across the entire development lifecycle.

TECHSKILLS: Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, JavaScript (ES6+), React, Redux Toolkit, React Query, Axios, Figma
Backend: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Swagger, JWT, Bcrypt
